author: wsanchez
msg: If you are going to use $(APRUTIL_LIBS), you have to use
$(APRUTIL_LDFLAGS) or you might not find, or worse get the wrong,

author: wsanchez
msg: Darwin also wants -l flags passed to shared libraries

author: jwoolley
msg: Fixed the apr_mmap_dup ownership problem for disjoint pools by getting
rid of the is_owner thing completely.  Instead, we place all of the dup'ed
apr_mmap_t's in a ring with each other (essentially the same as refcounting
the mmaped region but without the where-do-you-store-it pitfall).
